Articles.Content: Bowl of water liquid oxygen Dioxygen difluoride molten tungsten
None still. It's not any chemical element or compound.
Wild guess here but, Soviet Union?
A green field? [Poker table?]

Greece flag Union Jack

usa flag Swedish flag
Is it TIME?

Called a colour, seems unfair,

Called some water, I have more,

With a beach that has no sands,

And lights turned on by famous hands.

The rock? Best made to disappear.

The garden? Place for eye and ear.

So cross the tracks, but look both ways,

And hope for many sunny days.

New page post so I can remember...

- - - Updated - - -

I have no idea, the sky?

We need a hint...
Still none. It's not any sort of flag. And dang, I thought I made this one simple.
I feel it's related to Mars and its rovers. (Red planet, the part with water, rovers constructed by the best of the best, making rocks disappear with laser, sun powered...)
Solid logic, but it's nothing to do with Mars I'm afraid.
we need a hint as to what to riddle is about (country or something like that. what type of object it is)
The universe itself?
Humans? Not as the mentality, but the species.

we need a hint as to what to riddle is about (country or something like that. what type of object it is)
From what I've seen of past riddles I don''t feel hints like that are very helpful. They seem to just end up inviting a lot of scattergun guessing. This time I have been ruling out entire categories of thing as a stroke, usually in response to someone guessing a bunch of things in some category or other. But I suppose I can expand the riddle.

Called a colour, seems unfair,

Called some water, I have more,

With a beach that has no sands,

And lights turned on by famous hands.

The rock? Best made to disappear.

The garden? Place for eye and ear.

So cross the tracks, but look both ways,

And hope for many sunny days.

My tower inspired by one much higher,

My team in bright orange attire,

Fish is best fresh from the frier,

This riddle comes down to the wire.

A... no. Maybe it's a... no, that's ridiculous. Hmm...

Inspired by by one much higher,

of a team with orange of fire?

Perhaps a line sinker,

but not for just a tinker?

Maybe a reel it is,

but I cannot know for sure.

Until I am confirmed,

it is all a blur.

Edited April 23, 2015 by Xannari Ferrows

Well I would say a rocket launch to the lynth but that's probably wrong

commercial fishing?

recrational fishing
It's a ship isn't it?
Columbia?
Highbury?
Still no. Not a ship.
Prisoners wear orange so hms iron gate?
a prison?
